channel.title: Revealed-Gaming seeks Dedicated Developer
channel.description:
Revealed-Gaming is a live server with 20+ players online at all times. It has been ran and developed by myself, by as we are reaching higher player volumes (peaking at 40+), I am in need of some assistance with the development of the server.
Host Settings: • Powerful mAnticore Dedi (Anti-DDOS) • 16GB RAM • 16GHZ Processor
Server Features: • 100% Dicing! • World PvP System • 85% Dungeoneering w/ party interfaces • Location Saving/Teleport w/ interface • Prestige System with shop • Full Nex w/ attack styles • Custom Quests • All skills fully functional • Clean, Custom Interfaces • Loads of Content • Full Summoning w/ interfaces • Clean, Original Home • Full Loyalty's with Shop • 45+ Unique Teleports • Handpicked, Helpful staff members • Fully Functional vote4items • Clean Site • + Much More!
We are currently look for one developer. Must be dedicated, and must put for effort. Must be fluent in java.
Add my skype or reply with application. jordan321321321

item.title: Revealed-Gaming seeks Dedicated Developer
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:5, topic:533781”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=652578.msg4373144#msg4373144 date=1381320741]

16GHZ Processor
:palm:
Try to be realistic when lying
[/quote]I guess it would be possible with dual server cpu’s and using that (I can never think of the word ) not water cooling but the thingy that makes ti literally smoke and all word not coming to mind. I know I have seen single bulldozer amd cpu’s going to like 8.3 using the stuff.

Lmao no not at all.
Whether you put 1000 cpu’s or 1 the clock speed is still the same. You can’t go adding up.
It’s like saying that if you drive with 5 cars that can reach 200mph, that you together will drive 1000mph[/quote]again, assumption lol never dealt with server cpu’s just know I have seen some crazy stuff out there. The 8120 at like 8.3 ghz was the highest I’ve heard about on a single cpu

Read full topic

item.title: Revealed-Gaming seeks Dedicated Developer
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:533781”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=652578.msg4372533#msg4372533 date=1381102019]

16GHZ Processor
:palm:
Try to be realistic when lying
[/quote]I guess it would be possible with dual server cpu’s and using that (I can never think of the word ) not water cooling but the thingy that makes ti literally smoke and all word not coming to mind. I know I have seen single bulldozer amd cpu’s going to like 8.3 using the stuff.[/quote]
Lmao no not at all.
Whether you put 1000 cpu’s or 1 the clock speed is still the same. You can’t go adding up.
It’s like saying that if you drive with 5 cars that can reach 200mph, that you together will drive 1000mph

Read full topic

It has been ran and developed by myself, by as we are reaching higher player volumes (peaking at 40+), I am in need of some assistance with the development of the server.
